price: "Wancan ne, dõmin ya san cẽwa lalle ne ni ban yaudareshi ba a ɓõye, kuma lalle Allah bã Ya shiryar da kaidin mayaudara."
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika liyaʿlama annī lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī kayda al-khāinīna
